text:
@maddow Well then. Let's hope Trump is the first deliciously ironic casualty of coronavirus in the White House.

Come on, evangelicals! Where's your praying for the vengeful and angry God of the Old Testament to unleash His mighty wrath of pestilence on the world of sinners? Trump's #1.
